verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came כִּשְׁמֹ֖עַ <WH8085> had heard יָבִ֣ין <WH2985> And it came to pass when Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king חָצ֑וֹר <WH2674> of Hazor וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> [those things] that he sent אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹבָב֙ <WH3103> to Jobab מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king מָד֔וֹן <WH4068> of Madon וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> and to the king שִׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8110> of Shimron וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> and to the king אַכְשָֽׁף׃ <WH407> of Achshaph

וְֽאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַמְּלָכִ֞ים <WH4428> And to the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who מִצְּפ֗וֹן <WH6828> that [were] on the north בָּהָ֧ר <WH2022> of the mountains וּבָעֲרָבָ֛ה <WH6160> and of the plains נֶ֥גֶב <WH5045> south כִּֽנֲר֖וֹת <WH3672> of Chinneroth וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֑ה <WH8219> and in the valley וּבְנָפ֥וֹת <WH5299> and in the borders דּ֖וֹר <WH1756> of Dor מִיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> on the west

הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> [And to] the Canaanite מִמִּזְרָ֣ח <WH4217> on the east וּמִיָּ֔ם <WH3220> and on the west וְהָאֱמֹרִ֧י <WH567> and [to] the Amorite וְהַחִתִּ֛י <WH2850> and the Hittite וְהַפְּרִזִּ֥י <WH6522> and the Perizzite וְהַיְבוּסִ֖י <WH2983> and the Jebusite בָּהָ֑ר <WH2022> in the mountains וְהַֽחִוִּי֙ <WH2340> and [to] the Hivite תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> the foot חֶרְמ֔וֹן <WH2768> under Hermon בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land הַמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <WH4709> of Mizpeh

וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <WH3318> And they went out הֵ֗ם <WH1992> they וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מַֽחֲנֵיהֶם֙ <WH4264> they and all their hosts עִמָּ֔ם <WH5973> with עַם־ <WH5971> people רָ֕ב <WH7227> with them much כַּח֛וֹל <WH2344> even as the sand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> shore הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> that [is] upon the sea לָרֹ֑ב <WH7230> in multitude וְס֥וּס <WH5483> with horses וָרֶ֖כֶב <WH7393> and chariots רַב־ <WH7227> many מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> very

וַיִּוָּ֣עֲד֔וּ <WH3259> were met together כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all הַמְּלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> And when all these kings הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> of these וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> they came וַיַּחֲנ֤וּ <WH2583> and pitched יַחְדָּו֙ <WH3162> together אֶל־ <WH413> at מֵ֣י <WH4325> at the waters מֵר֔וֹם <WH4792> of Merom לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> to fight עִם־ <WH5973> against יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> against Israel פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֮ <WH3091> unto Joshua אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֣א <WH3372> Be not afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶם֒ <WH6440> because כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מָחָ֞ר <WH4279> of them for to morrow כָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> about this time הַזֹּ֗את <WH2063> likewise אָנֹכִ֞י <WH595> I נֹתֵ֧ן <WH5414> will I deliver them up אֶת־ <WH853> כֻּלָּ֛ם <WH3605> all חֲלָלִ֖ים <WH2491> all slain לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel אֶת־ <WH853> סוּסֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5483> their horses תְּעַקֵּ֔ר <WH6131> thou shalt hough וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַרְכְּבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4818> their chariots תִּשְׂרֹ֥ף <WH8313> and burn בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> came יְהוֹשֻׁ֡עַ <WH3091> So Joshua וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עַם֩ <WH5971> and all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֨ה <WH4421> of war עִמּ֧וֹ <WH5973> with עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> and עַל־ <WH5921> by מֵ֥י <WH4325> with him against them by the waters מֵר֖וֹם <WH4792> of Merom פִּתְאֹ֑ם <WH6597> suddenly וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <WH5307> and they fell upon בָּהֶֽם׃

וַיִּתְּנֵ֨ם <WH5414> delivered יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> And the LORD בְּיַֽד־ <WH3027> them into the hand יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel וַיַּכּוּם֒ <WH5221> who smote וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֞וּם <WH7291> them and chased עַד־ <WH5704> far צִיד֣וֹן <WH6721> Zidon רַבָּ֗ה <WH7227> them unto great וְעַד֙ <WH5704> until מִשְׂרְפ֣וֹת מַ֔יִם <WH4956> and unto Misrephothmaim וְעַד־ <WH5704> until בִּקְעַ֥ת <WH1237> and unto the valley מִצְפֶּ֖ה <WH4708> of Mizpeh מִזְרָ֑חָה <WH4217> eastward וַיַּכֻּ֕ם <WH5221> and they smote עַד־ <WH5704> until בִּלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> no הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <WH7604> them until they left לָהֶ֖ם שָׂרִֽיד׃ <WH8300> them none remaining

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> did לָהֶם֙ יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> And Joshua כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אָֽמַר־ <WH559> bade ל֖וֹ יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto them as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> סוּסֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5483> their horses עִקֵּ֔ר <WH6131> him he houghed וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַרְכְּבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4818> their chariots שָׂרַ֥ף <WH8313> and burnt בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire ס

וַיָּ֨שָׁב <WH7725> turned back יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> And Joshua בָּעֵ֤ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִיא֙ <WH1931> he וַיִּלְכֹּ֣ד <WH3920> and took אֶת־ <WH853> חָצ֔וֹר <WH2674> Hazor וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכָּ֖הּ <WH4428> the king הִכָּ֣ה <WH5221> and smote בֶחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> thereof with the sword כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חָצ֣וֹר <WH2674> for Hazor לְפָנִ֔ים <WH6440> beforetime הִ֕יא <WH1931> he רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> was the head כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַמַּמְלָכ֥וֹת <WH4467> of all those kingdoms הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וַ֠יַּכּוּ <WH5221> And they smote אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַנֶּ֨פֶשׁ <WH5315> all the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֤הּ לְפִי־ <WH6310> that [were] therein with the edge חֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> of the sword הַֽחֲרֵ֔ם <WH2763> utterly destroying לֹ֥א <WH3808> not נוֹתַ֖ר <WH3498> [them] there was not any left כָּל־ <WH3605> every נְשָׁמָ֑ה <WH5397> to breathe וְאֶת־ <WH853> חָצ֖וֹר <WH2674> Hazor שָׂרַ֥ף <WH8313> and he burnt בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire

וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> And all the cities הַמְּלָכִֽים־ <WH4428> of those kings הָ֠אֵלֶּה <WH428> of these וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all מַלְכֵיהֶ֞ם <WH4428> and all the kings לָכַ֧ד <WH3920> take יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> of them did Joshua וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <WH5221> and smote לְפִי־ <WH6310> them with the edge חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> of the sword הֶחֱרִ֣ים <WH2763> [and] he utterly destroyed אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֔ה <WH6680> commanded מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> them as Moses עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> the servant יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

רַ֣ק <WH7535> but כָּל־ <WH3605> any הֶעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> But [as for] the cities הָעֹֽמְדוֹת֙ <WH5975> that stood עַל־ <WH5921> on תִּלָּ֔ם <WH8510> still in their strength לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not שְׂרָפָ֖ם <WH8313> burned יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel זוּלָתִ֛י <WH2108> none of them save אֶת־ <WH853> חָצ֥וֹר <WH2674> Hazor לְבַדָּ֖הּ <WH905> alone שָׂרַ֥ף <WH8313> burn יְהוֹשֻֽׁעַ׃ <WH3091> only [that] did Joshua

וְ֠כֹל <WH3605> All שְׁלַ֞ל <WH7998> And all the spoil הֶעָרִ֤ים <WH5892> of these cities הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> of these וְהַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> and the cattle בָּזְז֥וּ <WH962> took for a prey לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel רַ֣ק <WH7535> but אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every הָאָדָ֞ם <WH120> unto themselves but every man הִכּ֣וּ <WH5221> they smote לְפִי־ <WH6310> with the edge חֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> of the sword עַד־ <WH5704> until הִשְׁמִדָם֙ <WH8045> until they had destroyed אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> לֹ֥א <WH3808> no הִשְׁאִ֖ירוּ <WH7604> them neither left כָּל־ <WH3605> one נְשָׁמָֽה׃ <WH5314> refresh selves

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> As the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> Moses עַבְדּ֔וֹ <WH5650> his servant כֵּן־ <WH3651> so צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> command מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> so did Moses אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> Joshua וְכֵן֙ <WH3651> and so עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> and so did יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> Joshua לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הֵסִ֣יר <WH5493> undone דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> nothing מִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> of all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of all that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> So Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> all that land הַזֹּ֗את <WH2063> likewise הָהָ֤ר <WH2022> the hills וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַנֶּ֙גֶב֙ <WH5045> and all the south country וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> and all the land הַגֹּ֔שֶׁן <WH1657> of Goshen וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁפֵלָ֖ה <WH8219> and the valley וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעֲרָבָ֑ה <WH6160> and the plain וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַ֥ר <WH2022> and the mountain יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וּשְׁפֵלָתֹֽה׃ <WH8219> and the valley

מִן־ <WH4480> from הָהָ֤ר <WH2022> [Even] from the mount הֶֽחָלָק֙ <WH2510> Halak הָעוֹלֶ֣ה <WH5927> that goeth up שֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> to Seir וְעַד־ <WH5704> far בַּ֤עַל גָּד֙ <WH1171> even unto Baalgad בְּבִקְעַ֣ת <WH1237> in the valley הַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> of Lebanon תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> the foot הַר־ <WH2022> under mount חֶרְמ֑וֹן <WH2768> Hermon וְאֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַלְכֵיהֶם֙ <WH4428> and all their kings לָכַ֔ד <WH3920> he took וַיַּכֵּ֖ם <WH5221> and smote וַיְמִיתֵֽם׃ <WH4191> them and slew

יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> time רַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> a long עָשָׂ֧ה <WH6213> made יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> Joshua אֶת־ <WH854> with כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמְּלָכִ֥ים <WH4428> with all those kings הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> war

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> become עִ֗יר <WH5892> There was not a city אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which הִשְׁלִ֙ימָה֙ <WH7999> that made peace אֶל־ <WH413> with בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> with the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בִּלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> except הַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> save the Hivites יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> the inhabitants גִבְע֑וֹן <WH1391> of Gibeon אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all לָקְח֥וּ <WH3947> all [other] they took בַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> in battle

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> For it was of the LORD הָיְתָ֡ה <WH1961> receive לְחַזֵּ֣ק <WH2388> to harden אֶת־ <WH853> לִבָּם֩ <WH3820> their hearts לִקְרַ֨את <WH7125> that they should come against הַמִּלְחָמָ֤ה <WH4421> in battle אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> order הַֽחֲרִימָ֔ם <WH2763> that he might destroy them utterly לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> no הֱיוֹת־ <WH1961> receive לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like תְּחִנָּ֑ה <WH8467> [and] that they might have no favour כִּ֚י <WH3588> in לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> order הַשְׁמִידָ֔ם <WH8045> but that he might destroy כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> them as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses ס

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> Joshua בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> And at that time הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> he וַיַּכְרֵ֤ת <WH3772> and cut off אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽעֲנָקִים֙ <WH6062> the Anakims מִן־ <WH4480> from הָהָ֤ר <WH2022> from the mountains מִן־ <WH4480> from חֶבְרוֹן֙ <WH2275> from Hebron מִן־ <WH4480> from דְּבִ֣ר <WH1688> from Debir מִן־ <WH4480> from עֲנָ֔ב <WH6024> from Anab וּמִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all הַ֣ר <WH2022> and from all the mountains יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וּמִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all הַ֣ר <WH2022> and from all the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel עִם־ <WH5973> with עָרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5892> with their cities הֶחֱרִימָ֥ם <WH2763> destroyed them utterly יְהוֹשֻֽׁעַ׃ <WH3091> Joshua

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> were no נוֹתַ֣ר <WH3498> left עֲנָקִ֔ים <WH6062> There was none of the Anakims בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel רַ֗ק <WH7535> in בְּעַזָּ֛ה <WH5804> only in Gaza בְּגַ֥ת <WH1661> in Gath וּבְאַשְׁדּ֖וֹד <WH795> and in Ashdod נִשְׁאָֽרוּ׃ <WH7604> there remained

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> So Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> the whole land כְּ֠כֹל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> said יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> according to all that the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁה֒ <WH4872> unto Moses וַיִּתְּנָהּ֩ <WH5414> gave יְהוֹשֻׁ֨עַ <WH3091> and Joshua לְנַחֲלָ֧ה <WH5159> it for an inheritance לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> unto Israel כְּמַחְלְקֹתָ֖ם <WH4256> according to their divisions לְשִׁבְטֵיהֶ֑ם <WH7626> by their tribes וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> And the land שָׁקְטָ֖ה <WH8252> rested מִמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> from war פ
